ERROR_GAME_IN_PROGRESS.en: You can't start another game, {1}. An instance of {0} is already running on this chatroom.
ERROR_GAME_IN_PROGRESS.ro: Nu poţi porni alt joc, {1}. {0} rulează deja în această cameră.

ERROR_GAME_INEXISTENT.en: {0} doesn't seem to be recognized as a working game, {1}.
ERROR_GAME_INEXISTENT.ro: Se pare că {0} nu este un joc, {1}.
